prompts: Create a dark and fiery Pokemon that resembles a small dog with sharp features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with a strong sense of loyalty and protection.
Design a small quadruped Pokemon with a sleek black coat and bright orange markings.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the night, with a mysterious aura and fiery attacks.
Show me a Pokemon that is both fierce and playful, perfect for trainers who love adventure.
Make a Pokemon that can blend into dark environments but has a fiery personality and abilities.
Give me a medium-sized, dog-like Pokemon with a dual nature of fire and dark elements.
